name: Samurai Dash
description:
(For the optimal experience use the downloadable version)

You are the only defence left against the corruption.

Dash through your enemys and collect their data and use it to restore the world and repair yourself.

Hold on as long as you can.

A game for the Taku Mini Jam with the theme SCI-FI SAMURAI.

Music "Cut and Run" by Kevin MacLeod.
